name: Cynthia
summary: Healthcare executive with extensive experience in regulatory compliance, life sciences, nursing, and education. Proven track record leading global teams, implementing validated IT systems, and delivering telemedicine and life-care planning programs for workers' compensation and healthcare payers. Skilled in clinical operations, quality systems, and cross-cultural training.

experience.title: Vice President of Operations
experience.description: Developed and implemented the Remote Care Services Program; built IT infrastructure to navigate Workers' Compensation revisions; coordinated with physicians, carriers, applicants' attorneys, patients, and primary care providers; focused on workers' compensation clients.

experience.title: Project Manager, Global Regulatory Compliance / Life Sciences
experience.description: Led global regulatory compliance and life sciences projects; established and trained the Global Regulatory Compliance Team; focused on regulatory compliance and system validation within the pharmaceutical industry.

experience.title: Instructor, Cap Gemini Ernst & Young Global Regulatory Compliance Boot Camp
experience.description: Instructed boot camp for CGE&Y Regulatory Compliance Team on Good Manufacturing Practices, Good Clinical Practices, Good Laboratory Practices, and validation tools and methodology.

experience.title: Adjunct Instructor / Life Care Planner
experience.company: University of Florida Rehabilitation Training Institute
experience.description: Authored and taught Life Care Planning and Aging in the Catastrophically Injured.

experience.title: Healthcare Consultant / Life Sciences Project Manager
experience.company: G Major Consulting; Cap Gemini Ernst & Young; Accenture; Ness Technologies
experience.description: Worked as a healthcare and life sciences consultant with international teams; advised on regulatory compliance, IT validation, risk management, and telemedicine initiatives.

experience.title: Clinical SME / Patient Care Coordination
experience.description: Acted as clinical SME in Patient Care Coordination and Reporting System design and development; implemented facility audits; improved patient triage and care coordination; supported litigation and health-related cases.

experience.title: Validation Project Manager / Global Regulatory Compliance Lead
experience.description: Designed and delivered validated systems for multinational pharmaceutical clients; led a project spanning 63 sites in 23 countries with adherence to FDA, EMEA, ICH guidelines; oversaw pharmacovigilance and safety reporting.

education.degree: Certificate in Life Care Planning for Advanced Catastrophic Case Management (Post-Graduate Course of Study)
education.school: The University of Florida Rehabilitation Training Institute

certifications: Fellow, American Board of Forensic Examiners
